# virtual-scrolling-demo

## Properties

| Property                | Attribute                 | Description                                                      | Type                                                                         | Default     |
| ----------------------- | ------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------- | ---------------------------------------------------------------------------- | ----------- |
| `rowHeight`             | `row-height`              | Fixed height of rows                                             | `number`                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `rowRenderer`           | --                        | function for rendering different type of lists/rows              | `(rowStyles: any, fromRow: number, toRow: number, parentStyles: any) => any` | `undefined` |
| `rowsLength`            | `rows-length`             | for now, only fixed height rows can be rendered in the component | `number`                                                                     | `undefined` |
| `scrollContainerHeight` | `scroll-container-height` | Height of the container that would remain visible                | `number`                                                                     | `undefined` |
